title: Aqua Glycolic Facial Cleanser, 6-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 2)
description: Alpha Hydroxy Acid Skin Care System. Dermatologist recommended. Advanced cleaning care. Aqua Glycolic Facial Cleanser is gentle, non-drying and compatible with all skin types. Can also be used for shaving sensitive areas, such as the bikini line, face and underarms.

title: Olay Complete Daily Defense All Day Moisturizer With Sunscreen SPF30 -Sensitive Skin 2.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
description: If you have sensitive skin, you need trusted products to keep it looking healthy and beautiful, like Olay Complete Defense All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen. The hydrating formula was designed by Olay skin experts and tested by dermatologists to help maintain healthy, younger-looking skin. It also provides extra UV protection with SPF 30 sunscreen to protect against 97% of the sun's burning rays. This daily moisturizer conditions your skins surface with vitamins E, B3 and pro-vitamin B5, helping you maintain a fresh, healthy appearance. The formula is light, non-greasy, and non-comedogenic, which means it won't clog your pores. Just apply it liberally 15 minutes before going outside, and reapply every 2 hours if you remain outdoors. Taking care of your sensitive skin is simple. Use this daily moisturizer to condition and protect your skins surface for effective skincare thats practically effortless.
